name: Frontier Diver Progenexis
description:
It has been 1000 years since the first NT-Field collapse. ---- Earth has been abandoned and overrun by horrific creatures. ---- You are the pilot of recon drone EXT_078 "Hagfish". ---- Dive into the depths of END CITY and discover the horrors NT-Field crisis has left in it's wake.

________

Game Design and Programming:

Modus Interactive

Music:

Viktor Kraus

Enemy Design and Models:

Blood Machine
